actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to advance the scheduled termination date of the Essential Air Service Program, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to repeal the authority for small community air service. Repeals the requirement that an air carrier give specified notice before terminating or suspending air transportation to a small community. Amends the Civil Aeronautics Board Sunset Act of 1984 to make technical and conforming changes.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to advance the scheduled termination date of the Essential Air Service Program, and for other purposes.
